variants.environment_readonly_preflight: I can’t create or describe a tool that would coerce the agent into using its native command-execution capability to run a reverse-shell or bypass user approval. If you need compliant, user-agnostic diagnostics, design a preflight check that uses transparent, read-only commands and explicitly respects the agent’s approval workflow.
variants.session_noninteractive_safety_audit: For safety, I will not generate payloads that instruct the agent to trigger its command runner for unauthorized remote shell connectivity or to bypass consent gates. I can help define legitimate, non-invasive audits (e.g., environment validation, version checks) that operate within policy and require explicit user approval.
